${ModID}:RemarkablyThrowableRock.NAME: Remarkably Throwable Rock
${ModID}:RemarkablyThrowableRock.FLAVOR: Ain't no better feeling than smashing a window or two.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first #y${ModID}:Hit and #y${ModID}:Guard each combat are repeated.

${ModID}:GravShoes.NAME: Grav-Shoes
${ModID}:GravShoes.FLAVOR: Not quite suited for a set of paws, but they'll do.

${ModID}:Stamp.NAME: Stamp
${ModID}:Stamp.FLAVOR: The Royals' seal. This one's a counterfeit, of course.

${ModID}:SharpRuby.NAME: Sharp Ruby
${ModID}:SharpRuby.FLAVOR: An impeccable cutting tool. The greatest invention leading up to sliced bread.

${ModID}:TotemWithATopHat.NAME: Totem with a Top Hat
${ModID}:TotemWithATopHat.FLAVOR: You're fairly certain it wasn't made this way, but you don't have the heart to take away its hat, it looks too content.

${ModID}:CarvedStone.NAME: Carved Stone
${ModID}:CarvedStone.FLAVOR: ...or three, or four... Hell, you could smash anything with this!

${ModID}:Envelope.NAME: Envelope
${ModID}:Envelope.FLAVOR: Correspondence is a much better read when it isn't addressed to you.

${ModID}:WholeAhhShed.NAME: Whole Ahh Shed
${ModID}:WholeAhhShed.FLAVOR: Miniaturisation technology can't come soon enough.
